entry.title: Current Conditions: Mostly Cloudy, 1.8°C
entry.summary:

Visibility: 32.2 km

entry.title: Monday night: Chance of flurries. Low minus 13. POP 40%
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy with 40 percent chance of flurries this evening and after midnight. Clearing before morning. Wind becoming northwest 20 km/h late this evening. Low minus 13. Forecast issued 5:30 PM EDT Monday 27 March 2023

entry.title: Tuesday: Chance of flurries. High minus 3. POP 30%
entry.summary: Sunny. Increasing cloudiness in the afternoon then 30 percent chance of flurries late in the afternoon. Wind becoming west 20 km/h early in the afternoon. High minus 3. Wind chill minus 16 in the morning and minus 8 in the afternoon. UV index 3 or moderate. Forecast issued 5:30 PM EDT Monday 27 March 2023
